title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: September 28, 2023, 11:15:51 AMLast edit: October 05, 2023, 12:54:41 PM by minerjones
content: Sorting through some old toys, I came across this lot of old GI JOE figures and vehicles.Most are in great/good condition... some need some love (mostly the older figures/vehicles)Below is a list of figures....have not sorted the vehicles yet.Figures and vehicles will come with all/most of their original accessoriesA good website I found to look these up on is: https://www.yojoe.com/action/  or  https://www.3djoes.com/Code:1982 Machine Gunner/Rock 'n Roll1982 Mortar Soldier/Short-Fuze1983 Aiborne1983 Torpedo1983 Hiss Driver1983 Grunt1984 Clutch w/ vehicle VAMP Mark II1984 Stinger Driver w/ vehicle Night Attack 4-WD Stinger1984 Firefly1984 Cobra Commander (v2) (Hooded)1985 Airtight1985 Barbecue1985 Eels1985 SnowSerpent1986 BAT1986 Dr Mindbender1985/6 Hawk1986 Iceberg1986 Leatherneck1986 Low-Light1986 Sci-Fi1986 Viper1986 Zarana1986 AVAC Terrodrome w/ Firebat1986 Serpentor w/ Air Chariot1986 Thrasher w/ Dreadnok Thunder Machine1987 Big Boa1987 Chuckles1987 Cobra Commander v3 w/ battle armor1987 Croc Master1987 Fast Draw1987 Jinx1987 Psyche-Out1987 Raptor1987 Tunnel Rat (E.O.D.)1987 Backstop w/ Persuader tank1987 Ice Viper w/ Cobra WOLF tank1987 Sea Slug w/ Cobra Sea Ray1987 W.O.R.M.S. w/ Cobra Maggot tank1987 Zanzibar w/ Dreadnok Air Skiff1987 Red Dog1987 Taurus1987 Golobulus (Cobra-La)1987 Nemesis Enforcer (Cobra-La)1987 Royal Guard (Cobra-La)1987 The Fridge1988 Astroviper1988 Hit & Run1988 Iron Grenadiers1988 Repeater1988 Shockwave1988 Storm Shadow (v2)1988 Toxo-Viper1988 Skidmark w/ Desert Fox 6WD Jeep1988 Star-Viper w/ Cobra Stellar Stiletto1988 Supertrooper

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: OMG this pic takes me back, they were my very favorite toys to play with as a kid, that is an extremely nice collection to have even back in the day when they first came out, amazing you kept these so long. if we both lived in the same neighborhood growing up we would have for sure been friends, the only questions would be which one of us was going to be the good guys and which one was going to be Cobra.   GO JOE !!!!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: damn this is great! very very cool.

comments.author: Crytocanuk
comments.body: You had an awesome childhood growing up… now unbox those Transformers!!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Crytocanuk on September 28, 2023, 02:11:19 PMYou had an awesome childhood growing up… now unbox those Transformers!!oh man.. I wish.. all the robots are long gone
